data.name: The Far Kingdoms: Forgotten Relics
data.detailed_description:
In this Solitaire game you have to travel through 4 kingdoms and find stolen relics! You have received a letter from the Elven Prince Eldrin. A huge troll has stolen the kingdom’s precious relics and broken them apart. The pieces have been scattered all around the 4 kingdoms while the troll was being chased. Prince Eldrin is asking for your help in finding his stolen relics. Please help to find them before the Queen returns.

- Play 150 challenging Solitaire levels
- Find 14 missing relics
- Upgrade 4 kingdoms
- Play HO scenes to get the gold
- Reach highest rank by making combos and receive the badges

data.short_description: In this Solitaire game you have to travel through 4 kingdoms and find stolen relics - play 150 Solitaire and Hidden Object levels!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.0GHz CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
